Description.Name: Command Console 2
Description.Details: Allows you to directly command an additional MechWarrior The upgrades continue Commander. Interfacing this Star League technology with our own C&C systems is proving challenging, but there's no problem more money and time can't fix, right?

AssignedCastDescription: The next step will be to standardize the communication hardware between our 'Mechs and the Argo's systems so I can remove an abstraction layer from our ship-side software.
